title: Leuke Akte
description: Leuke Akte, the ‘White cape’ located on the Libyan coast of Egypt, was the site of an Isis cult wherein the Egyptian goddess was worshipped as Aphrodite, Muchis, and Eseremphis. An oracular shrine of Apollo was also found there.

properties.description: 1:1 million scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 15700
